00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LOG
00038 
00039 
00040 #include <obd_class.h>
00041 #include <lustre_log.h>
00042 #include "llog_internal.h"
00043 
00044 /* helper functions for calling the llog obd methods */
00045 static struct llog_ctxt* llog_new_ctxt(struct obd_device *obd)
00046 {
00047         struct llog_ctxt *ctxt;
00048 
00049         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ctxt);
00050         if (!ctxt)
00051                 return NULL;
00052 
00053         ctxt->loc_obd = obd;
00054         atomic_set(&ctxt->loc_refcount, 1);
00055 
00056         return ctxt;
00057 }
00058 
00059 static void llog_ctxt_destroy(struct llog_ctxt *ctxt)
00060 {
00061         if (ctxt->loc_exp) {
00062                 class_export_put(ctxt->loc_exp);
00063                 ctxt->loc_exp = NULL;
00064         }
00065         if (ctxt->loc_imp) {
00066                 class_import_put(ctxt->loc_imp);
00067                 ctxt->loc_imp = NULL;
00068         }
00069         OBD_FREE_PTR(ctxt);
00070 }
00071 
00072 int __llog_ctxt_put(const struct lu_env *env, struct llog_ctxt *ctxt)
00073 {
00074         struct obd_llog_group *olg = ctxt->loc_olg;
00075         struct obd_device *obd;
00076         int rc = 0;
00077 
00078         spin_lock(&olg->olg_lock);
00079         if (!atomic_dec_and_test(&ctxt->loc_refcount)) {
00080                 spin_unlock(&olg->olg_lock);
00081                 return rc;
00082         }
00083         olg->olg_ctxts[ctxt->loc_idx] = NULL;
00084         spin_unlock(&olg->olg_lock);
00085 
00086         obd = ctxt->loc_obd;
00087         spin_lock(&obd->obd_dev_lock);
00088         /* sync with llog ctxt user thread */
00089         spin_unlock(&obd->obd_dev_lock);
00090 
00091         /* obd->obd_starting is needed for the case of cleanup
00092          * in error case while obd is starting up. */
00093         LASSERTF(obd->obd_starting == 1 ||
00094                  obd->obd_stopping == 1 || obd->obd_set_up == 0,
00095                  "wrong obd state: %d/%d/%d\n", !!obd->obd_starting,
00096                  !!obd->obd_stopping, !!obd->obd_set_up);
00097 
00098         /* cleanup the llog ctxt here */
00099         if (CTXTP(ctxt, cleanup))
00100                 rc = CTXTP(ctxt, cleanup)(env, ctxt);
00101 
00102         llog_ctxt_destroy(ctxt);
00103         wake_up(&olg->olg_waitq);
00104         return rc;
00105 }
00106 EXPORT_SYMBOL(__llog_ctxt_put);
00107 
00108 int llog_cleanup(const struct lu_env *env, struct llog_ctxt *ctxt)
00109 {
00110         struct l_wait_info lwi = LWI_INTR(LWI_ON_SIGNAL_NOOP, NULL);
00111         struct obd_llog_group *olg;
00112         int rc, idx;
00113         ENTRY;
00114 
00115         LASSERT(ctxt != NULL);
00116         LASSERT(ctxt != LP_POISON);
00117 
00118         olg = ctxt->loc_olg;
00119         LASSERT(olg != NULL);
00120         LASSERT(olg != LP_POISON);
00121 
00122         idx = ctxt->loc_idx;
00123 
00124         /*
00125          * Banlance the ctxt get when calling llog_cleanup()
00126          */
00127         LASSERT(atomic_read(&ctxt->loc_refcount) < LI_POISON);
00128         LASSERT(atomic_read(&ctxt->loc_refcount) > 1);
00129         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00130 
00131         /*
00132          * Try to free the ctxt.
00133          */
00134         rc = __llog_ctxt_put(env, ctxt);
00135         if (rc)
00136                 CERROR("Error %d while cleaning up ctxt %p\n",
00137                        rc, ctxt);
00138 
00139         l_wait_event(olg->olg_waitq,
00140                      llog_group_ctxt_null(olg, idx), &lwi);
00141 
00142         RETURN(rc);
00143 }
00144 EXPORT_SYMBOL(llog_cleanup);
00145 
00146 int llog_setup(const struct lu_env *env, struct obd_device *obd,
00147                struct obd_llog_group *olg, int index,
00148                struct obd_device *disk_obd, struct llog_operations *op)
00149 {
00150         struct llog_ctxt *ctxt;
00151         int rc = 0;
00152         ENTRY;
00153 
00154         if (index < 0 || index >= LLOG_MAX_CTXTS)
00155                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00156 
00157         LASSERT(olg != NULL);
00158 
00159         ctxt = llog_new_ctxt(obd);
00160         if (!ctxt)
00161                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00162 
00163         ctxt->loc_obd = obd;
00164         ctxt->loc_olg = olg;
00165         ctxt->loc_idx = index;
00166         ctxt->loc_logops = op;
00167         mutex_init(&ctxt->loc_mutex);
00168         if (disk_obd != NULL)
00169                 ctxt->loc_exp = class_export_get(disk_obd->obd_self_export);
00170         else
00171                 ctxt->loc_exp = class_export_get(obd->obd_self_export);
00172 
00173         ctxt->loc_flags = LLOG_CTXT_FLAG_UNINITIALIZED;
00174         ctxt->loc_chunk_size = LLOG_MIN_CHUNK_SIZE;
00175 
00176         rc = llog_group_set_ctxt(olg, ctxt, index);
00177         if (rc) {
00178                 llog_ctxt_destroy(ctxt);
00179                 if (rc == -EEXIST) {
00180                         ctxt = llog_group_get_ctxt(olg, index);
00181                         if (ctxt) {
00182                                 CDEBUG(D_CONFIG, "%s: ctxt %d already set up\n",
00183                                        obd->obd_name, index);
00184                                 LASSERT(ctxt->loc_olg == olg);
00185                                 LASSERT(ctxt->loc_obd == obd);
00186                                 if (disk_obd != NULL)
00187                                         LASSERT(ctxt->loc_exp ==
00188                                                 disk_obd->obd_self_export);
00189                                 else
00190                                         LASSERT(ctxt->loc_exp ==
00191                                                 obd->obd_self_export);
00192                                 LASSERT(ctxt->loc_logops == op);
00193                                 llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
00194                         }
00195                         rc = 0;
00196                 }
00197                 RETURN(rc);
00198         }
00199 
00200         if (op->lop_setup) {
00201                 if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OBD_LLOG_SETUP))
00202                         rc = -EOPNOTSUPP;
00203                 else
00204                         rc = op->lop_setup(env, obd, olg, index, disk_obd);
00205         }
00206 
00207         if (rc) {
00208                 CERROR("%s: ctxt %d lop_setup=%p failed: rc = %d\n",
00209                        obd->obd_name, index, op->lop_setup, rc);
00210                 llog_group_clear_ctxt(olg, index);
00211                 llog_ctxt_destroy(ctxt);
00212         } else {
00213                 CDEBUG(D_CONFIG, "obd %s ctxt %d is initialized\n",
00214                        obd->obd_name, index);
00215                 ctxt->loc_flags &= ~LLOG_CTXT_FLAG_UNINITIALIZED;
00216         }
00217 
00218         RETURN(rc);
00219 }
00220 EXPORT_SYMBOL(llog_setup);
00221 
00222 int llog_sync(struct llog_ctxt *ctxt, struct obd_export *exp, int flags)
00223 {
00224         int rc = 0;
00225         ENTRY;
00226 
00227         if (!ctxt)
00228                 RETURN(0);
00229 
00230         if (CTXTP(ctxt, sync))
00231                 rc = CTXTP(ctxt, sync)(ctxt, exp, flags);
00232 
00233         RETURN(rc);
00234 }
00235 EXPORT_SYMBOL(llog_sync);
00236 
00237 int llog_cancel(const struct lu_env *env, struct llog_ctxt *ctxt,
00238                 struct llog_cookie *cookies, int flags)
00239 {
00240         int rc;
00241         ENTRY;
00242 
00243         if (!ctxt) {
00244                 CERROR("No ctxt\n");
00245                 RETURN(-ENODEV);
00246         }
00247 
00248         CTXT_CHECK_OP(ctxt, cancel, -EOPNOTSUPP);
00249         rc = CTXTP(ctxt, cancel)(env, ctxt, cookies, flags);
00250         RETURN(rc);
00251 }
00252 EXPORT_SYMBOL(llog_cancel);
00253 
00254 /* context key constructor/destructor: llog_key_init, llog_key_fini */
00255 LU_KEY_INIT_FINI(llog, struct llog_thread_info);
00256 /* context key: llog_thread_key */
00257 LU_CONTEXT_KEY_DEFINE(llog, LCT_MD_THREAD | LCT_MG_THREAD | LCT_LOCAL);
00258 LU_KEY_INIT_GENERIC(llog);
00259 
00260 int llog_info_init(void)
00261 {
00262         llog_key_init_generic(&llog_thread_key, NULL);
00263         lu_context_key_register(&llog_thread_key);
00264         return 0;
00265 }
00266 
00267 void llog_info_fini(void)
00268 {
00269         lu_context_key_degister(&llog_thread_key);
00270 }
